statements: DELETE FROM shipping_documents WHERE customs_approved = FALSE AND shipping_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipping_documents WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND shipping_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipping_documents WHERE customs_approved = FALSE AND customs_form_id >= 500;
DELETE FROM ShippingDocuments WHERE shipping_id = 100 AND shipment_id = 200;
DELETE FROM CustomsForms WHERE shipment_id = 300 AND form_type = 'Invoice';
DELETE FROM customs_forms WHERE shipping_document_id IN (SELECT document_id FROM shipping_documents WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM customs_forms WHERE shipment_id = 2001 AND form_type = 'Invoice';
DELETE FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND shipment_date < '2022-01-01';
